page.title: 01IDEN GREEN,BENENDEN, KENT
page.content: {Rural}area of farmland,broad leaved woodland, mostly coppice,apple orchards, three Hop gardens. Land slopes to the S.from the {hamlet}of Iden Green at 300' in the N.E.to the Hexden Channel 25' above sea level. It is undulating and the lanes thickly hedged. Many small ponds and small stands of trees. Only 1.5km of{A Road} in the S.E.corner and 1.25km of{B Road}across the N.E. corner. Minor road through hamlet is short cut and traffic ignoring speed limit is cause of complaint by villagers. Standen Street,Dingleden and Sandhurst Lane are laes with scattered housing. 97 houses within the hamlet.Total in area 171. Socio- Economic Groups 1-5. Hamlet of Iden Green has 1 small shop with sub-Post Office. 2 Public Houses,Congretional Church,Recreation Ground.
